sentences.en: " The postman gave it to us.
sentences.cn: “ 邮递员交给我们的. ”

sentences.en: A postman is a man employed to deliver letters and parcels.
sentences.cn: 邮差就是雇用来投递信件和包裹的人.

sentences.en: At the door he met an intelligent postman coming out with letters for the morning delivery.
sentences.cn: 他在邮政总局门口碰见一个伶俐的邮差，拿着信从邮局走出来，去送早班信。

sentences.en: Curtis Matthews, a retired postman from North Carolina, was running the bar as a favour to his brother, who had left Louisiana after the attempt on his life the year before.
sentences.cn: 柯蒂斯·马修斯是一名来自南卡罗来纳的邮递员。 在因约翰·马修斯生命受到威胁而离开路易斯安那州以后，他就帮哥哥经营着酒店。

sentences.en: Go and see if / whether the postman has been yet.
sentences.cn: 去看看邮递员来过了吗.

sentences.en: He looked like a postman but he was really a fake.
sentences.cn: 他看上去像个邮递员,但实际上是个骗子.

sentences.en: He tried many different jobs; in the end he became a postman.
sentences.cn: 他做过多种工作, 最后当了邮递员.

sentences.en: Is he a tall postman? Yes, he is.
sentences.cn: 他是一个高的邮递员吗？是的，他是。

sentences.en: Our dog went at the postman.
sentences.cn: 我们的狗扑向邮递员.

sentences.en: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.cn: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路.

sentences.en: That tis my father. He is a postman. I love my father.
sentences.cn: 那是我的父亲。 阠他是一名邮递员。 我爱我的父亲。

sentences.en: The duty of a postman is to deliver letters and parcels.
sentences.cn: 送信和邮包是邮递员份内的事.

sentences.en: The old man often stands here to watch out for the postman.
sentences.cn: 老人常常站在这儿等邮递员。

sentences.en: The postman argued away his misdelivery of the mail.
sentences.cn: 那个邮递员为他误投邮件的事辩解.

sentences.en: The postman delivers letters.
sentences.cn: 邮递员投递信件.

sentences.en: The postman left a letter.
sentences.cn: 邮递员送来了一封信.

sentences.en: The postman ran away with the dog nipping at his heel.
sentences.cn: 邮递员跑开了,狗在身后紧追着要咬他.

sentences.en: The postman stuck the letter under the door.
sentences.cn: 邮递员把信从门底下塞入.

sentences.en: The postman was mixed up, so he delivered the package to the wrong house.
sentences.cn: 邮递员糊涂了, 所以他将包裹投错了.

sentences.en: With the help of the postman, Tom went out of the letter - box.
sentences.cn: 在邮递员的帮助下, 汤姆从信箱里出来了.

words.tran_cn: 记录；[会计] 过帐；委派

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters
someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters
